Design Question: how does this wg vote on things?
what does this wg vote on?
what kinds of decisions / potential changes does the DAO community need to make in Phase 1?
how is the rest of the dao involved in governance in phase 1?
what is the interim tooling we use for governance in phase 1?
how does this wg change over time?
what are the expectations of the wg members?
what are milestones for the wg?
what kinds of governance meetings are there? what are they for? and how frequently do they meet?
how is what happens in this wg communicated out to the rest of the DAO?
